objects.text:
100% Pure, Grade A Whole Milk • No Preservatives
Rich in Calcium • Farm-to-Table Freshness Guaranteed

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Premium Dairy Milk - Pure & Natural Goodness
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure, Grade A Whole Milk
• No artificial hormones or preservatives added
• Rich in calcium and essential nutrients
• Farm-to-table freshness guaranteed
• Perfect for drinking, cooking, and baking
• Available in various sizes - pitcher, bottle, and glass options
• Creamy texture and naturally sweet taste
• Pasteurized for food safety
• Sourced from local dairy farms
• Excellent source of protein and vitamins

banner_details:
The banner features a clean and modern layout promoting farm-fresh dairy milk. It has a smooth light-blue gradient background with subtle decorative elements such as radial highlights, thin white curved lines resembling waves, and semi-transparent horizontal stripes. The top portion prominently displays a bold header (`heading`) in deep blue for brand emphasis, followed by a softer tagline (`tagline`) emphasizing product purity. Centrally placed is a high-resolution image of milk containers (`product_image`), signifying freshness. Below that is the product description (`description`) in compact font, pricing detail (`price`) in large bold text, and a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with "ORDER NOW" (`cta`) in white on a dark blue background.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: #BEE1FF
- Light Blue Gradient: #E6F4FF → #BEE1FF
- Deep Blue (Text/Button): #1E5B94
- Mid Blue (Tagline): #4A7AAB
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a refreshing and clean composition dominated by creamy white and soft icy blue tones. The milk itself presents a pure, soft white color (#F9F7F1), symbolizing freshness and purity. The glass containers introduce smooth transparency, accented with cool sky blue hues (#A3C7E5) at the edges and rims, reflecting a crisp, clean aesthetic. Light reflections on the glass blend both blue and white seamlessly, giving a polished and hydrated feel. The background is neutral, emphasizing the product without distraction. A harmonious palette for an advertisement banner could include: #F9F7F1 (milk white), #A3C7E5 (sky blue), #E1EAF4 (ice gray-blue), and #B8DBF0 (light blue).
